page.title: 06Seasonal Cycle.
page.content: {SPRING -pet lambs to bottle feed.Men {plough and roll fields.SUMMER -turnips {sown.Men spread manure and ridge {drills.When through the ground,plants {are hoed.Grass for hay is mowed by {tractors,turned to dry,baled then {stacked for the bale grab.Bales are {stored for winter.AUTUMN -cereal crops {are harvested by binder,stooked, {stacked then threshed for winter feed {and straw bedding.Otherwise the {combine harvester is used.WINTER - {presents problems.Heavy snowfalls {block roads.Tractors give access to {main roads.Clearing twisting farm {roads of deep drifts takes time.Some {have tractor snow ploughs.The young {ski,sledge or snowball.In 1983,a bad {storm blocked all roads.Even council {ploughs couldn't get through.Sheep {which had been buried,survived.Spring {snow makes lambing}difficult.
